data.eml:eml: Oldest new genus of Myrmeleontidae (Neuroptera) from the Eocene Green River Formation

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Makarkin, Vladimir N. (2017): Oldest new genus of Myrmeleontidae (Neuroptera) from the Eocene Green River Formation. Zootaxa 4337 (4), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4337.4.5
